item.title: CS4All
item.description: While I wouldnâ€™t go so far as to say that coding is the new literacy, I believe that society should and will be placing a higher emphasis on coding than other specialized skills that currently take priority such as foreign language or music. In that vein, I would argue that if students are required to take foreign language or fine arts classes, they should also be required to take at least one computer science class.
